advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Antonio Zekic (@antoniozekic), Natalie Silvanovich of Google Project Zero, and an anonymous researcher

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Natalie Silvanovich of Google Project Zero, Antonio Zekic (@antoniozekic) and John Aakerblom (@jaakerblom), ABC Research s.r.o, Yinyi Wu, Tommaso Bianco (@cutesmilee__)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A configuration issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive kernel state
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Holger Fuhrmannek of Deutsche Telekom Security

advisories.impact: A user with physical access to an iOS device may be able to read past diagnostic logs
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved data protection.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position may be able to intercept mail credentials
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Jiří Vinopal (@vinopaljiri) of Check Point Research

advisories.impact: A user may send audio and video in a FaceTime call without knowing that they have done so
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Sonali Luthar of the University of Virginia, Michael Liao of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Rohan Pahwa of Rutgers University, and Bao Nguyen of University of Florida

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write issues were addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A denial-of-service issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed app may be able to determine which app is currently using the camera
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional restrictions on the observability of app states.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed that led to the disclosure of kernel memory. This was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A user may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A user with physical access to a device may be able to access contacts from the lock screen
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved data protection.

cves.credit: Ashwani Rajput of Nagarro Software Pvt. Ltd, Srijan Shivam Mishra of The Hack Report, Jugal Goradia of Aastha Technologies, Evan Ricafort (evanricafort.com) of Invalid Web Security, Shesha Sai C (linkedin.com/in/shesha-sai-c-18585b125), Amod Raghunath Patwardhan of Pune, India

advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Narendra Bhati of Suma Soft Pvt. Ltd. Pune (India) @imnarendrabhati

advisories.impact: A website may be able to track users through Safari web extensions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass code signing checks
advisories.description: An issue in code signature validation was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to access photos from the lock screen
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A user may be able to view restricted content from the lock screen
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to use Siri to access private calendar information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Amit Prajapat of Payatu Security Consulting Private Limited

advisories.impact: A user with physical access to a device may be able to use Siri to obtain some call history information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Andrew Goldberg of The McCombs School of Business, The University of Texas at Austin (linkedin.com/andrew-goldberg-/)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Deleted contacts may still appear in spotlight search results
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read a persistent device identifier
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved entitlements.

cves.credit: Guilherme Rambo of Best Buddy Apps (rambo.codes)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An unauthorized user may be able to access browsing history
advisories.description: An issue existed with the file paths used to store website data. The issue was resolved by improving how website data is stored.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security, Jeff Johnson

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: Visiting a website that frames malicious content may lead to UI spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Jeonghoon Shin (@singi21a) at Theori working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improvements to the sandbox.
